channel.title: hugo-site on Andrea Rau, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in hugo-site on Andrea Rau, PhD

item.title: Applications in animal, plant, and human genomics
item.description: My methodological research is strongly motivated by applications in human, animal, and plant genomics. I have made strong efforts to contribute analyses and develop methods that can provide useful solutions in these areas.
